name: The Stair
description:
Only 2% of players ever reach the 150th stair... How far can YOU go?

Bounce up the moving staircase all the way to outer space.

Any miss and the stairs shrink, making it harder to make the next jump. But nail a combo of perfect bounces, and the stairs grow back again!

Ready to build your own unique staircase?
Grab a ball and start bouncing!
